trans-unit.source: This function guarantees that Mod(dividend, divisor) = dividend - Int(dividend / divisor) * divisor.

seg-source.mrk: This function guarantees that Mod(dividend, divisor) = dividend - Int(dividend / divisor) * divisor.

target.mrk: This function guarantees that Mod(dividend, divisor) = dividend - Int(dividend / divisor) * divisor.

trans-unit.source: This function does not guarantee that dividend or divisor can be represented, specifically with floating point numbers.

seg-source.mrk: This function does not guarantee that dividend or divisor can be represented, specifically with floating point numbers.

target.mrk: This function does not guarantee that dividend or divisor can be represented, specifically with floating point numbers.

trans-unit.source: If integers are passed this function does an integral modulo operation. Otherwise it falls back to a floating point operation which per the previous remark means it may not produce the expected output.

seg-source.mrk: If integers are passed this function does an integral modulo operation.
Otherwise it falls back to a floating point operation which per the previous remark means it may not produce the expected output.

target.mrk: If integers are passed this function does an integral modulo operation.
Otherwise it falls back to a floating point operation which per the previous remark means it may not produce the expected output.
